text:
@realDonaldTrump "should quickly be forgotten."

Actually, shouldn't we:

(a) be on alert for a resurgence of COVID-19; and
(b) learn lessons from COVID-19 to take steps to be prepared for future pandemics?

It seems that "forgetting" is the last thing a nation and its leaders should do.
